not replace a medical record. The more items are added, 
the more likely clinicians are to record variables twice. 
When incorporating new variables or parameters, 
consider: 
 Is it relevant for labour monitoring? 
 Is it evidence based? 
 Is it feasible to collect it in any different setting? 
 Is it already in the medical record?
 Would it be more appropriate in the medical record?
Involve experts  
and end-users
Pilot the adapted  
LCG
Keep it concise
